extendedInfo.description: Do you want to keep track on your salary? Do you have an hourly wage? Have you ever felt unmotivated at work? We have the solution for you!Applications:-Adjust your payment amount and type (hourly wage, holiday compensation, inconvenient time compensation, tax)-A timer that shows your reward for every second -Start, stop-Monthly summary (hours rewarded, gross- and net salary )-Annual summary (hours rewarded, gross- and net salary)-Timesheet their you are able to see the exact times of when you have workedHow to use KeepTrack:- On the first use, set your salary information right.- Start the timer at the beginning of the working day. Stop the timer at your breaks. Start the timer after the breaks again. Click reset at the end of the working day.- Go to the summary page to see an overview of your working hours and your wage.- Go to track page and you will be able to see a timesheet. For when you have worked and for how long.
